预兆-精类: 散发着薰衣草香气的咯咯笑声与欢笑 Giggles and Laughter that smell of Lavender
悬挂着几缕奇异颜色的发丝 Strands of strange colored Hair, hanging
阳光照耀的花丛，所有花朵皆被斩首 Sunny patch of Flowers, all decapitated
隐约的叮当声，如同成千上万的小铃铛 Faint tinkling as thousands of tiny bells
石头上溅满了颜料和涂鸦 Stones splashed with Paints and Graffito
一层细腻闪亮的粉末，使物品如宝石般璀璨 Fine coat of glittering powder, bejeweling things
草莓酱的微小手印 Tiny Handprints of Strawberry Jam
花瓣，散落在小径上 Flower Petals, strewn along a Pathway
诡异的松果金字塔堆 Eerily pyramidal pile of Pinecones
五彩缤纷的布条，系在每一处 Colorful Ribbons of Cloth, tied on everything
里外翻转的袜子，塞在一只漏水的鞋子里 Inside Out Sock, shoved in a leaky Shoe
不可思议的平衡岩石，一触即倾 Impossibly balanced Rocks, a breath could tip
